title: XGBoost: A Love Letter to Tabular Data
excerpt: XGBoost is the beast of modeling in my industry, so let's dig into how it works.

title: Welcome to Chethan's Lab
excerpt: Welcome to my blog where I share notes, experiments, and insights about machine learning and AI systems.
content:
This is my personal blog where I'll be sharing my thoughts, experiments, and learnings about machine learning and artificial intelligence.

## What to Expect

- **Applied ML**: Real-world applications and case studies
- **Experiments**: Code experiments and their results
- **Systems**: Deep dives into ML systems and infrastructure
- **Research**: Notes on interesting papers and techniques

Stay tuned for more content!
